author: prbuzz.com
title: Best MMORPG 2016 Facebook Page Launches
text:
The Bestmmorpg2016.com website has launched its Facebook page for fans of massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) fans. The FB page features new and upcoming MMO game news, reviews, and videos.
Bestmmorpg2016.com, a new video game portal that focuses on massively multiplayer online role-playing games (MMORPGs), has launched its Facebook page that features news, reviews, top lists, and videos about the latest and most popular MMO games.
"The Facebook page is ideal for gamers who enjoy looking at news and reviews of new and upcoming MMORPG games. We don't post a lot but what we do post and share are interesting articles or videos," said Angelique Stokes, Bestmmorpg2016.com editor.
The Facebook page can be found at http://www.facebook.com/Best-Mmorpg-2016-296152650571012/
An MMORPG is a type of online game in which players create an avatar that they use to interact with other players in a virtual world. Game content normally includes different races/classes of characters, quests or missions, player-vs-environment (PvE) combat, player-vs-player (PvP) battles, and community content like guilds and factions.
"Typically, MMORPGs take three or more years to develop. This means that it is mostly big-name game developers that tackle this genre. However, gamers and industry watchers will be in for a few surprises since there are actually a few small, indie developers that are poised to release some very innovative new MMO games in 2016," said Stokes.
The main website at Bestmmorpg2016.com offers gamers a more detailed look at upcoming games. Currently, ten titles are featured. All of the upcoming games are still under development but some of them already have early access or closed and open beta versions available.
For more information, visit http://bestmmorpg2016.com .
About Bestmmorpg2016.com
Bestmmorpg2016.com is a leading MMORPG review and opinion website that offers a fresh and new perspective to current news about the MMO game industry. Run by MMO fans for other MMO fans, the website is constantly updates with news, feature articles, and reviews of MMORPG games.
